crashing_actor_infos.description: List of information for the crashing actors.

delete_unit_on_stopped.description: [bool]Mark unit for deletion when all actors have stopped

on_corpse_anim_event.description: [string]event when entity is switch to a corpse

corpse_collision_filter.description: [string]On stopped collision filter to set on actors

force_corpse_on_stopped.description: [bool]Force a corpse once everything has stopped

first_collision_event.description: [string]The moment any actor collides with anything, it will trigger this event

minimum_land_delay.description: By how long should we delay the time until we are considered landed?

minimum_delay.description: By how long should we delay the time until we start becoming a corpse?
